resources.string:
<style>
* {
 color: ${font_color_1};
 background-color: ${bg_color};
}

time {
 font-style: italic;
 color: ${font_color_time};
}

img {
 width: 100%;
}

a {
 border-bottom: 2px dotted ${color_p};
 text-decoration: none;
}

blockquote {
 margin-right: 0;
 margin-left: 1.4em;
 border-left: 0.2em solid ${color_p};
 padding-left: 0.4rem;
}

pre {
 border: 1px solid ${font_color_code};
 border-radius: 1rem;
 background-color: ${bg_color_code};
 padding: 1rem;
 overflow-x: scroll;
 color: ${font_color_code};
}

code {
 background-color: ${bg_color_code};
 color: ${font_color_code};
}

p,b,i {
 line-height: 1.5em;
}

pre code {
 padding: 0 !important;
}
</style>
